history.proof: rewrite RtoC_plus. scongruence use: RtoC_opp unfold: Cminus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RtoC_opp (RtoC (- _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of sin_minus (sin (_ - _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: rewrite RtoC_opp. rewrite RtoC_plus. rewrite sin_minus. rewrite RtoC_mult. rewrite Cmod_mult. rewrite R_dist. rewrite <- Rmult_minus_distr_l. rewrite Rplus_opp_r. apply derive_pt_eq_0. apply derivable_pt_lim. intros eps Heps. exists (mkposreal _ Heps). intros h Hneq Hlt. apply Rminus_diag_uniq. rewrite <- (tech3 eps). apply BinIntDef.Z.pow_pos_nonneg; lra.
